entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
